title: Boris Johnson: Grenfell victims were 'overlooked, ignored and failed' – video
text:
The prime minister has said victims of the Grenfell tower fire had been overlooked and ignored before the tragedy and failed by institutions following it.

Watched by relatives, survivors and campaigners from the public gallery, Johnson said: ‘No report, no words, no apology will ever make good the loss suffered and the trauma experienced.’

His comments came after a long-delayed report into the blaze that killed 72 people was released on Wednesday which concluded there were ‘systemic failings’ by the London fire brigade
